body.p: The WebHelp Responsive variant features a very flexible layout, is designed to adapt to any screen size, and is available for DITA document types. The WebHelp Responsive with Feedback variant also includes a feedback system that allows your users to make comments and allows you to manage and reply to them. This section contains information about configuring a WebHelp Responsive system and customizing the output.

WebHelp Responsive output can be produced by using built-in transformation scenarios from within Oxygen XML Editor/Author or by using the Oxygen XML WebHelp Plugin to process the transformations from a script outside of Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
